summary.header: Market Locations Inventory Management Application (MLiMa) Frame-works Package Edition {2021} (February 21)
summary.article: public class DBroutines // Required to Allow Usage public void Display() // Required to Allow Usage
public class ControllerRoutines // Required to Allow Usage public void Selection(string character) // Required to Allow Usage public void Display() // Required to Allow Usage

public class ViewRoutines private string _data = "Welcome to the MLiMa Order Center"; // Internal Usage of Storing a Title public void MenuInterface(int MenuLogic) // Required to Allow Usage string UserSelection = Console.ReadLine(); // Allow User to Choose int MessageType = -1; // Try-Catch-Logic; Unit Testing by Validation int ExitCode = 0; // Ends execution of Program and de-allocates Memory public void Display() // Required to Allow Usage

public class ApplicationProgrammingInterface // Required to Allow Usage int MenuLogic = 0; // 0 = Open Main Menu for Screen, Functions 1-8 static void Main() // Required to Run static bool StructuralIntegrityUTintegration() // Unit Testing Group
